sys_ui_action.name: Start Twistel workflow

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_action_e1937273db8adc500249be4f29961912
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ui_action"><sys_ui_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><action_name/><active>true</active><client>false</client><client_script_v2><![CDATA[function onClick(g_form) {

}]]></client_script_v2><comments/><condition>gs.hasRole('admin')</condition><form_action>true</form_action><form_button>true</form_button><form_button_v2>false</form_button_v2><form_context_menu>false</form_context_menu><form_link>true</form_link><form_menu_button_v2>false</form_menu_button_v2><form_style/><hint/><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><list_action>false</list_action><list_banner_button>false</list_banner_button><list_button>false</list_button><list_choice>false</list_choice><list_context_menu>false</list_context_menu><list_link>false</list_link><list_save_with_form_button>false</list_save_with_form_button><list_style/><name>Start Twistel workflow</name><onclick/><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var workflow = '';
var type = current.sub_category;
	
	if(type == '5')
		workflow = 'Honor-Health-Community-WF';
	else if (type == '4')
		workflow = 'Honor-Health-Work-Exposure-WF';
	
	
    try {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_sthc_human_resou.TwistleHR', 'StartWorkflow');
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('location', current.main_campus.getDisplayValue());
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('Sys_id', current.caller.employee_number);
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('workflow', workflow);

        //override authentication profile 
        //authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'
        //r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);

        //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID
        //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');

        //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either
        //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor
        //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null
        //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);

        var response = r.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		current.api_workflow_response = responseBody;
		current.update();
    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.message;
    }]]></script><show_insert>true</show_insert><show_multiple_update>false</show_multiple_update><show_query>false</show_query><show_update>true</show_update><sys_class_name>sys_ui_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>LGOMEZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-23 21:57:25</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e1937273db8adc500249be4f29961912</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Start Twistel workflow</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Research" source="x_sthc_research">bd54e1c4dbd10850a1dd7d8bbf961908</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Research">bd54e1c4dbd10850a1dd7d8bbf961908</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_action_e1937273db8adc500249be4f29961912</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>LGOMEZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-23 21:57:25</sys_updated_on><table/><u_ctv>false</u_ctv><ui11_compatible>true</ui11_compatible><ui16_compatible>false</ui16_compatible></sys_ui_action></record_update>
